children.text: Check if a square is being attacked by the White Pawn.

children.functionDescription: Check if a square is being attacked by the White Pawn

children.name: attackedByPawn
children.comment: Stores if the square is being attacked by the Pawn

children.text: There is no White Pawn on the board, therefore no square can be attacked by it.
Squares on the top diagonals of the white pawn are attacked.
Check if a square is being attacked by the White Rook.

children.functionDescription: Check if a square is being attacked by the White Rook

children.name: attackedByRook
children.comment: Stores if the square is being attacked by the Rook

children.text: There is no White Rook on the board, therefore no square can be attacked by it.
Squares to where the Rook can move are attacked.
Check if a square is being attacked by the White Queen.

children.functionDescription: Check if a square is being attacked by the White Queen

children.name: attackedByQueen
children.comment: Stores if the square is being attacked by the Queen

children.text: There is no White Queen on the board, therefore no square can be attacked by it.
Squares to where the Queen  can move are attacked.
Get squares attacked by White Rook.

functionParameters.comment: Run function in check attack squares mode

children.text: Get squares attacked by White Queen.

children.functionDescription: Get squares attacked by White Queen

functionParameters.name: attack

children.text: Check squares on the top-left diagonal.
Check squares on the top-right diagonal.
Check squares on the bottom-left diagonal.
Check squares on the bottom-right diagonal.

children.functionDescription: Get all available positions that a piece can move to

children.title: White Rook Movement
children.description: A Rook here can move to any square on its horizontal or vertical axes, except those intercepted by another piece.

children.title: White Queen Movement
children.description: The Queen can move in 8 directions, as long as the square it wants to go is not intercepted by another piece.

children.title: White Pawn Movement
children.description: In this particular end game scenario, the pawn can only move forward, except if there is King in front of it.

children.title: White/Black King Movement
children.description:
An available square for the king follows 4 rules:
- Is inside the board
- Is not adjacent to the other King
- Is not being attack
- Does not contain a piece of the same color

children.text: King can move a single square on any direction.
Check if square is inside the board and doesn't contain a piece.
Piece is the White King, therefore the square cannot be adjacent to the Black King, or have another white piece.
Pìece is the Black King, therefore the square cannot be adjacent to the White King, or attacked by the other piece.
Make Black King move closer to given X and Y position.

children.functionDescription: Make Black King move closer to given X and Y position

children.name: bestXY
children.comment: Best XY Coordinates to go to, so far

children.name: bestDist
children.comment: Best (smallest) distance to the desired point, so far

children.text: Check which one brings the King closer to the desired XY position.
